title: Excerpts from PHYSICS Division Assessment Team Database
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:goc]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

The GOC's Assessment Teams exist to investigate and monitor parathreats. These units operate covertly in the field to obtain intelligence so that an appropriate response can be coordinated, which may include the deployment of a [[[goc-supplemental-strike-teams| Strike Team]]]. Although Assessment Teams are not intentionally sent out to eliminate parathreats, their members are generally armed, and are authorised to respond with lethal force if engaged in the field. While the size of an Assessment Team varies depending on their specialty, most are small groups of fewer than a dozen operatives. Although many members of Assessment Teams have military backgrounds, civilian specialists and undercover agents are recruited as required.

Assessment Teams are given a three digit identifier, usually beginning with a "7", accompanied by unique callsign. Assessment Teams with their own distinctive unit insignia typically use a cartouche (oval) shape, emblazoned with their Team number. Assessment Teams do not usually have a unit motto or slogan.

An incomplete list of Assessment Teams is included below.

+ Assessment Teams
||~ Number ||~ Callsign ||~ Casefiles ||~ Description||~ Insignia||
|| 701 || "The Grey Hand" || [[[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/scp-021-int| SCP-021-INT]]] || || ||
|| 701 || "Jellybean" || [[[taken-from-a-global-occult-coalition-casefile| Items from a Global Occult Coalition Document Bag]]], [[[goc-tale-sequence-trauma| "Trauma"]]] || In the [[[unfounded-hub| Unfounded Canon]]], came into contact with and subsequently terminated [[[SCP-353]]].|| ||
|| 711 || "Problem Solverz" || [[[LTE-1004-Caliburn-Velveteen]]] || Located on-site in Area Maiden-4, France. || [[image https://i.imgur.com/ZwLCDHK.png style="width:150px;" link="/lte-1004-caliburn-velveteen LTE-1004-Caliburn-Velveteen"]]  ||
|| 713 || "Paw Patrol" || [[[kte-9817-bluebuster-mendel-shelley-renegade-armbrusteri| KTE-9817-Bluebuster-Mendel-Shelley-Renegade-Armbrusteri]]] || || ||
|| 717 || "Aegean Clodhoppers" || [*http://scp-int.wikidot.com/kte-7883-velveteen-gris KTE-7883-Velveteen-Gray] || Preliminary evaluation of ancient archeological sites. || ||
|| 718 || "Whispers" ||  [[[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/goc-far-east-orientation| Orientation to the Far East Division of the Global Occult Coalition]]] || Team based in Kyoto. || ||
|| 719 || "Yotara" ||  [[[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/goc-far-east-orientation| Orientation to the Far East Division of the Global Occult Coalition]]] || [CONFIDENTIAL] || ||
|| 721 || "Lazy Wolf" ||[[[KTE-2013-Kapala-Mendes]]], [[[re-kto-7890-valentinus|Re: KTO-7890-Valentinus]]] || Undercover investigation of cults. || [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art:goc-unit-insignia/721-Lazy-Wolf.png link="/art:goc-unit-insignia" style="width:100px;"]] ||
|| 722 || "Bottlecaps" ||  [[[goc-tale-sequence-trauma| "Trauma"]]] || || ||
|| 723 || || [[[SCP-4239]]] || Deployed in Arizona for the initial investigation of a reported parathreat. || ||
||  735 || "Sparkplug" || [[[goc-tale-sequence-assessment| "Assessment"]]], [[[goc-tale-sequence-strike| "Strike"]]], [[[goc-tale-sequence-joint-venture|"Joint Venture"]]], [[[goc-tale-sequence-trauma|"Trauma"]]] [[[goc-tale-sequence-scrambleorder|"Scramble Order"]]], [[[goc-tale-incident-bl-7-alpha|Transcript of Incident BL-7 Alpha]]], [[[Raising Hell]]], [[[voices-carry-part-1|Voices Carry]]], [[[SCP-7162]]], [[[Rascal One Actual]]], [[[Special Assets]]], [[[STRIKEFALL]]] || A four-man Assessment Team based out of Noxon, Montana. Formerly known as "Lightning Mace", the poor quality of the artwork on their original heraldry lead to their current callsign. || [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art:goc-unit-insignia/735-Sparkplug.png link="/art:goc-unit-insignia" style="width:150px;"]] ||
|| 737 || "Dreamliner" || [[[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/early-summer-1998|Early Summer, 1998]]] || || ||
|| 738 || "Regal Probe" || [[[SCP-2748]]] || || ||
|| 742 || "Jericho" || [[[goc-tale-sequence-trauma| "Trauma"]]] || || ||
|| 762 || "Failed Teleportation" || [*http://scp-int.wikidot.com/lte-0641-ragweed LTE-0641-Ragweed] || || ||
|| 765 || "Pine Tree Dolls" ||  [[[https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/coalition-data-volume-1961| Coalition Data Volume 1961: The New Land Island Incident]]] (untranslated) || || ||
|| 777 || "Fingertip" || [[[lucky-triple-sevens| Lucky Triple Sevens]]], [[[not-so-lucky-triple-sevens| Not-So-Lucky Triple Sevens]]] || Specialises in undercover infiltration, aided by thaumatology and [[[goc-supplemental-equipment| Grey Suits]]]. || [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art:goc-unit-insignia/777-Fingertip.png link="/art:goc-unit-insignia" style="width:150px;"]]  ||
|| 781 || "Pyramidions" || [[[SCP-5525]]] || A hostile archeology unit, specializing in the exploration of ancient ruins and structures from parahistorical civilizations. Investigated the ruins of Atlantis after it was raided by the US Military. || [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art:goc-unit-insignia/781-Pyramidions.png link="/art:goc-unit-insignia" style="width:150px;"]] ||
|| 791 || "Ultramarine Orb Elixir" || [*http://scp-int.wikidot.com/lte-1969-blaecca-ford-osmanthus-spiral LTE-1969-Blaecca-Ford-Osmanthus-Spiral] || Preliminary investigation and monitoring of parathreats in digital space. || ||
|| 797 || "Sons of the Elk" ||  [[[https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/coalition-data-volume-1961| Coalition Data Volume 1961: The New Land Island Incident]]] (untranslated) || || ||
|| 984 || || [*http://scp-int.wikidot.com/lte-0641-ragweed LTE-0641-Ragweed] || || ||

||~ Designation ||~ Callsign ||~ Casefiles ||~ Description ||~ Insignia ||

|| 280 || "Quicksilver" || [[[Halfway Lost]]] || Rapid Response Assessment Team with "silver and white" heraldry. ||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art:goc-unit-insignia/280-Quicksilver.png link="/art:goc-unit-insignia" style="width:150px;"]] ||
|| 0296 || "Clay and Fire" || [[[SCP-5495]]] || Deployed in Afghanistan for the preliminary investigation of a parathreat. ||  ||
|| 296 || "Eagle Pavise" || [[[goc-tale-sequence-awtok| AWTOK]]] || Investigation of suspected non-humans. ||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art:goc-unit-insignia/296-Eagle-Pavise.png link="/art:goc-unit-insignia" style="height:150px;"]] ||
|| 1151 || "Reprobates" || [[[halfway-lost| Halfway Lost]]] || Consists of skilled assessment personnel with difficult personalities. ||  ||
|| 1314 || "Gehenna Ambassadors" || [[[UTE-1666-Goodrick-Freud]]] || Investigates unusual behavior for possible occult involvement. ||  ||

++ Further Additions

This list is a collaborative project, so feel free to update existing entries, or to add new rows using the format below -  leave cells blank if that information isn't available. Articles from any language branch of the SCP Wiki can be listed. Including brief mentions is fine, we're mostly here for the quirky names!
> = **{{@@|| Number || Callsign || Casefiles || Description || Insignia ||@@}}**
